attributes.action: ensure that legislation governing the national minimum wage, also applies to sleepover duties, as typically encountered in the health and social care sector.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Both the private and public sector, in health and social care, typically pay employees who cover 'sleepovers' a rate which falls well below the national minimum wage. These workers provide a vital service within the care industry being both on call and away from their families while carrying out their duties.
